Control Name: 4.1.3 Availability metrics to measure and monitor availability such as Mean Time To Recover (MTTR) and Mean Time Between Failure (MTBF).
Control Statement: Are availability targets measured and monitored? Mean time to recover (MTTR) - the average time it takes to restore a component after a failure. Mean time between failures (MTBF) - how long a component can reasonably expect to last between outages

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 4.1 What reliability targets and metrics have you defined for your application?
control_attributes.Control: 4.1.3 Availability metrics to measure and monitor availability such as Mean Time To Recover (MTTR) and Mean Time Between Failure (MTBF).
control_attributes.Description: Are availability targets measured and monitored? Mean time to recover (MTTR) - the average time it takes to restore a component after a failure. Mean time between failures (MTBF) - how long a component can reasonably expect to last between outages
